trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBCTS652_03891_SEQ_00<tab>Hautdilong has something to share with you, and he can't hold it in any longer.

TEXT_SUBCTS652_03891_HAUTDLONG_000_000<tab><var 08 E905 ((Miss)) ((Sir)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>, there you are! Ehll Tou and I have been thinking of how we can repay you for all your help.
TEXT_SUBCTS652_03891_HAUTDLONG_000_001<tab>After much deliberation, we decided to ask Master Arvide to help us craft a bespoke item, just for you. I hope he hasn't spoiled the surprise.
TEXT_SUBCTS652_03891_HAUTDLONG_000_002<tab>When last we spoke, he said that the project was nearing completion. Perhaps he is finished by now? Oh, I do hope you like it!

TEXT_SUBCTS652_03891_HAUTDLONG_000_010<tab>I think you'll be pleasantly surprised by what Ehll Tou and I have devised for you. Master Arvide should have it ready by now─he should be at the market in the New Nest.
TEXT_SUBCTS652_03891_ARVIDE_000_020<tab>Ah, welcome! I take it you've spoken to Hautdilong, then. Well, here you go!
TEXT_SUBCTS652_03891_ARVIDE_000_021<tab>Ehll Tou was most insistent I designed this horn just so. Blow on it and the little dragon will fly to your side wheresoever you may be.
TEXT_SUBCTS652_03891_ARVIDE_000_022<tab>Although I suppose I can't call her little any more, eh? 'Tis only natural that as she grows, her desire to see more of the world would grow as well.

TEXT_SUBCTS652_03891_ARVIDE_000_023<tab>That's why she wanted you to have this. Show her every corner of the civilized world, and introduce her to people of all sort. She'll need a wide breadth of knowledge if she means to paint her kin the full picture of our kind.

TEXT_SUBCTS652_03891_ARVIDE_000_024<tab>When I first agreed to help Ehll Tou, I had no inkling I might be contributing to something much larger than myself. Whatever comes of her efforts in the end, I must say I'm honored to have played my small part in it. Thanks for giving me this opportunity, friend.
